Users retain full control of their funds whilst executing trades against a highly liquid off-chain orderbook. With one of the most liquid order books in the crypto space, users can now take advantage of a high-liquidity, low-spread trading experience without sacrificing control. Additionally, DeversiFi is partly controlled by the necDAO - a decentralised autonomous organisation with over 17,000ETH, making it one of the largest DEX DAOs date.

results.name: My Crypto Heroes
results.description: The Time, money and passion you spent on the games will become your assets in this world.
results.fullDescription:
The Time, money and passion you spent on the games will become your assets in this world. My crypto Heroes is a blockchain game that has been going on since 2018. You can send heroes to dungeons and collect materials. Materials will be used in Lab to create Extensions NFT that you can use to make your heroes stronger or trade them. Win the battle with your strengthened team and aim for the top! You can also enjoy the content "Rays Mining" for beginners for free.


  1. Quest: Quest is PVE mode where you get materials as a reward.
  2. Crafting: Crafting is content you can create Extensions NFT using Materials collected in quests.
  3. Battle: 

(3.a) Duel Cup: Duel Cup is a basic PvP mode you can participate in every week with five tiers. Based on your rankings, you can earn Winners Points and Emblems as rewards


(3.b) Colosseum: Colosseum is a PvP modo you accumulate until your run out of life and you can earn GOZO and Gold Dust as rewards.


(3.c) Knight Battle: Flag battles are battle content where you fight for honor among nine Lands. Qualifying is held every season, and the top players selected from each land fight as representatives. As a reward for Flag battles, you can get Cp required to earn MCHC in Cryptid Wars.


(3.d) Cryptid Wars: Cryptid Wars is GvG (Group by Group) content and this is only where MCHC is newly minted and distributed to players. At the beginning of a season, all forts are occupied by the enemy and each Land will be randomly put on a starting place to advance. Let's defeat the “Guardian Cryptid” to take over forts among Lands.

results.name: Ether Game
results.description: Transparent and autonomous Investment Pyramid Game
results.fullDescription: Transparent and autonomous Investment Pyramid Game. The open source contract pays back 30% of the investment sum every 30 days from the initial investment date. Transfers are secured and executed by Ethereum blockchain. Contract open source code does not allow any interventions, so nothing can influence the system automated execution of its functions. ETH tokens transferred to the Game are stored safely on the contract address as the contract does not own any private or public keys.

results.name: Donut Chain
results.description: DonutChain is a decentralized, trustless blockchai
results.fullDescription: DonutChain is a decentralized, trustless blockchain game running directly on the Ethereum network. Here are the basics of how it works: This is a game in which the last person to buy a donut wins the pot! People or robots can purchase 1 or more donut token which resets timer to 24 hours and marks them as the current leader. With each donut purchase next token price increases slightly. Players receive a stream of passive income from the game while donuts sell. 80% goes to rewards pool. These rewards can be withdrawn anytime. When the timer reaches zero, last person to buy a donut wins! Make sure to withdraw your rewards before timer reaches zero! Or buy 1+ donut so you can be the one who gets the pie! No rewards will be available after timer reaches zero. Players can obtain a refferal URL and/or refer friends to the game for extra rewards. 10% from ETH spent via your referral link.

results.name: Slumber Swap
results.description: Slumber Swap is a decentralized marketplace des
results.fullDescription: Slumber Swap is a decentralized marketplace designed to transfer the ownership of Dragonchain's DDSS (Slumber Score) between two parties. Built on Dragonchain and interchaining with Ethereum, Slumber Swap's custom smart contracts unlock the ability for anyone to buy or sell DDSS+DRGN in a simple and secure manor. Ethereum Smart Contracts provide a decentralized escrow service to secure the funds during the transfer process. DDSS holds a lot of value in the Dragonchain community and provides users with early access to spin up nodes, eligibility to participate in Takara, enhanced voice within DragonDen to name a few.

results.fullDescription: Bear Escape is the most addicting Ethereum game inspired by the classic film ‘Raiders of the lost Ark’. Bear Escape is a game for all optimistic crypto buffs in the hope of market bounce to make Eth earnings. When all keys are sold out during a round in a prize pool, the lucky key number drawing commences, there will be one number selected randomly out of all the keys sold. The lucky key holder wins jackpot rewards and takes away 100% of the rewards !

results.name: Auctionity
results.description: The world's largest blockchain auction hous
results.fullDescription: The world's largest blockchain auction house for cryptocollectibles - Auctionity is a Dapp based on Ethereum blockchain to auction NFT in ether. Auctionity allows participants to create auctions, bid on and buy goods in real-time on a global, decentralized network, while maintaining payment and delivery guarantee. Our goal is to revolutionize the auction world thanks to its unique application of blockchain technology. The platform is the first-ever, 100% blockchain-based application enabling people to sell Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs) at auction. The community is at the heart of the project: auctions become viral thanks to the users, allowing everyone to earn money by promoting auctions on the platform. Auctionity is interactive and easy to use. For example, live auctions can be run by members called "Auctioneers" who can earn money while having fun animating auction sales!
